name: Ubilabs
text: In the middle of Hamburg’s most lively district is a rapidly growing workshop of developers, designers, and business people focussing on building the next generation of Google Maps powered websites. Their speciality is to build mobile and web apps for international brands such as Google, Telekom, and Daimler. Ubilabs is Google Maps Enterprise Partner and organizes HH.js – the largest JavaScript user group in Northern Germany.
